subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we accepted your debt request
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire NOW):
$377,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://typinfanny.com/
